summary: Glowing circlet gems, befitting for mages.
descriptionHtml:
I5K Glow in the Dark Circlets
=============================

Changes 01/02/12: 
-Fixed some circlets not glowing plus made the glow a bit brighter
-Added an optional Bright version giving off a light efect

Description:

Adds a mild glow to the gems of all of the circlet headgear. The effects can be noticed better when in the dark, hence the title.

Compatibility: This mod uses customised meshes which add only a glow effect and a glow map texture file.  There should be no conflict with custom texture mods such as high-res or design/colour changes.

Installation:

Unpack the contents to your Skyrim data folder

Uninstallation:

If you have any other mods that add custom headgear it might be a good idea to check these folders for other meshes/textures so that you don\'t deactivate them.

Go to data\\meshes\\armor and delete the circlets folder. 
Go to data\\textures\\armor and delete the circlets folder.

Tools used:

BSAopt, the ideal Skyrim BSA extraction program
Gimp 2.0, a really useful and free image editing program
Nifskope 1.1.0-RC5 - Latest version compatible with Skyrim meshes
author: Ironman5000

files.name: Glow Circlet Gems v2
files.changelogHtml:
Brighter Glow plus fixed some circlets not glowing properly
Added an optional Bright version giving a bright light effect
